aesthetic.vibe_description: Fresh and modern consumer retail aesthetic built around a deep forest-green brand identity on near-white surfaces. The typography is bold and editorial on hero screens, transitioning to clean and functional on product listing and detail screens. The overall impression is premium but approachable — a fashion-forward brand with clear visual hierarchy and confident use of negative space.

rationale.action_primary: Deep forest green (#1F3A1F) used on all primary CTA buttons — 'Go Shopping' pill and 'Add to Cart' full-width button. This is the brand's darkest green applied to interactive elements, creating clear affordance against the white surface.
rationale.action_primary_dark: Inferred — light green (#4ADE80, Tailwind Green 400) as the inverted primary action color for a dark theme, consistent with the green palette identity. Not observed in screenshot.
rationale.surface_default: The slightly warm off-white (#F7F9F4) used as the screen background color across all three app screens. Distinct from pure white cards — creates a layering effect.
rationale.surface_raised: Pure white (#FFFFFF) used on all product cards, the search input container, and the bottom product detail panel. Elevated above the F7F9F4 background.
rationale.surface_default_dark: Inferred — very deep forest green-black (#0F1A0F) as the dark mode background. Not observed.
rationale.surface_raised_dark: Inferred — dark green (#1A2B1A) for raised surfaces in dark mode. Mirrors the text_primary color applied as a surface.
rationale.text_primary: Dark forest green-tinted near-black (#1A2B1A) used for all primary text: product names, prices, headings. The greenish undertone aligns with the brand's nature/green identity.
rationale.text_muted: Medium muted gray-green (#8A9A8A) used for secondary spec labels ('Height:', 'Width:', 'Material') and subdued captions. Clearly differentiated from text_primary in contrast.
rationale.text_inverse: White (#FFFFFF) used as text on the dark green action buttons.
rationale.border_default: Very light sage (#E8EDE8) visible on card outlines, search input borders, and the spec dividers in the product detail panel.
rationale.border_focus: Assigned same as action_primary (#1F3A1F) — the dark green brand color is the natural focus ring color. Not directly observed but consistent with the design system pattern.
rationale.feedback_error: Vivid pink (#E0446E) used on the filled heart favorite icon. Assigned as feedback_error due to its role as the only non-green accent color and its red-family hue. Could alternatively be classified as an accent with no feedback assignment — but red-family colors in consumer apps typically serve the error/favorite semantic role.
